author: Doomie
description: This module is set to test your speed in reading wires, as defusers only have 8 seconds to cut the needed wires, before they are striked. All four panels must have wires cut, and the landmine be pressed to defuse. Module idea was thought up while playing fallout 3.
name: Land-Mines
notes: Author may be difficult to contact, please check 'Old Manual Spreadsheet' if you want better contact details.
